price: 12.Nabiyow ku-marak duma Nabii Nuuc maraay, Qaad deqsita maraa kee firqawnay kaxxa qandee kee sinam edde digaalá xiikol-le inkih sinni farmoytit dirabboyseenih.
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَعَادٞ وَفِرۡعَوۡنُ ذُو ٱلۡأَوۡتَادِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin waʿādun wafir'ʿawnu dhū al-awtādi
